'Polemarch' documentation

Welcome to Polemarch’s documentation!¶

Polemarch is a service for infrastructure orchestration based on ansible. Simple WEB gui for infrastructure orchestration using ansible playbooks.

You could find latest releases there. Also you could find source code in official repository.

Contact us on any questions or report bugs.
